name: badbank_three_tiers
description: ![BadBank_Look](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51896051/174496347-8fcbc557-0666-481c-baad-86c56f2c3dfa.PNG) ## Description #### This full-stack app was created as a final project for MIT Full-Stack Application bootcamp. It uses MERN with MongoDB Atalas to have a cloud base web application. Firebase is used for Web Authentication. Heroku is used as the deployment tool.
